page.title: 19SUMMER AND WINTER LETTING
page.content: Sometimes through the winter people stay in the holiday cottages. Some of them come from London and they say that they would like to live in Kilmington. Some people do bed and breakfast throughout the year, too. In the summer, most people stay for only one night, so they are probably touring the West Country. They come from miles away and sometimes they stay for longer. People who take in visitors for bed and breakfast usually keep a book in which the holidaymakers write where they have come from and what it was like staying here for their holiday.
